books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: The Minnesota investigator Virgil Flowers becomes involved in the hunt for an ancient inscribed stone smuggled out of the Middle East.
books.name: STORM FRONT

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: The New York lawyer Stone Barrington teams up with a rogue former C.I.A. agent and heads West to protect Barrington’s son and his friends from Russian assassins.
books.name: DOING HARD TIME

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Now grown up, Dan, the boy with psycho-intuitive powers in “The Shining,” helps another child with a spectacular gift.
books.name: DOCTOR SLEEP

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read until after his death.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: The lives of two couples converge unexpectedly.
books.name: THE LONGEST RIDE

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: Detective Michael Bennett, living with his 10 adopted children on a California farm, is pursued by the head of a Mexican drug cartel he once put in jail.
books.name: GONE

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: At Christmastime, a big-city columnist sets out to interview a reclusive author in Alaska.
books.name: STARRY NIGHT

books.author: by Orson Scott Card
books.description: Government agencies breed child geniuses and train them as soldiers. Originally published in 1985.
books.name: ENDER'S GAME

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher is thrown into jail on trumped-up charges and must clear his name.
books.name: NEVER GO BACK

books.author: by Dave Eggers
books.description: A dystopian novel about life on the campus of a powerful Internet company.
books.name: THE CIRCLE

books.author: by Vi Keeland
books.description: A hard-bodied mixed martial arts fighter and a steady lawyer have a lot more in common than they bargained for.
books.name: WORTH THE FIGHT

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: An imprisoned ex-lawyer schemes to exchange information about who murdered a judge for his freedom.
books.name: THE RACKETEER

books.author: by Elizabeth Gilbert
books.description: A 19th-century botanist’s love of knowledge takes her to Tahiti; by the author of “Eat, Pray, Love.”
books.name: THE SIGNATURE OF ALL THINGS

books.author: by Tijan
books.description: A woman who kills her roommate’s Mafia-connected rapist turns to the one person who can protect her.
books.name: CARTER REED
